A sample output checking if file is official from the internet.

name: File Hash Compare
short_description:
File Hash Compare is a file security tool that allows you to check the
integrity of files using commonly used hash algorithms (MD2, MD4, MD5,
SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512, CRC32, CRC64, and Tiger) and shows the
result in a tabular form, allowing you to compare more files in one view.

The time needed to calculate the hash of a file depends on how many hash algorithms you selected, the speed and condition of your PC, and the size of the file.

If you find the app useful and a great help to you, please leave your
rating at the Sourceforge page.

For comments, suggestions, reports for bugs, or any other message,
you may contact me earl.gangoso@gmail.com

You can use the app without limitations and restrictions unless your
activity is intrusive, you will claim the app, or reverse engineer it.
summary: "Compare files and check their integrity in an easy way."
